items.title: Bump trim-newlines and chrome-webstore-upload-cli

labels.name: dependencies
labels.description: Pull requests that update a dependency file

items.body:
Bumps [trim-newlines](https://github.com/sindresorhus/trim-newlines) to 4.0.2 and updates ancestor dependency [chrome-webstore-upload-cli](https://github.com/fregante/chrome-webstore-upload-cli). These dependencies need to be updated together. Updates `trim-newlines` from 1.0.0 to 4.0.2
Release notes

Sourced from trim-newlines's releases.

v4.0.2

  • Minor performance improvement 4676273

https://github.com/sindresorhus/trim-newlines/compare/v4.0.1...v4.0.2

v4.0.1

  • Fix ReDoS vulnerability for the .end() method 25246c6
    • CVE-2021-33623

Also fixed for v3 in 3.0.1.

https://github.com/sindresorhus/trim-newlines/compare/v4.0.0...v4.0.1

v4.0.0

Breaking

  • Require Node.js 12 c00fe4f
  • This package is now pure ESM. Please read this.

https://github.com/sindresorhus/trim-newlines/compare/v3.0.0...v4.0.0

v3.0.0

Breaking:

  • Require Node.js 8 (#1) 75db891

Enhancements:

  • Add TypeScript definition (#1) 75db891

https://github.com/sindresorhus/trim-newlines/compare/v2.0.0...v3.0.0

Commits
  • abb78c1 4.0.2
  • 4676273 Minor performance improvement
  • b637183 4.0.1
  • 25246c6 Fix ReDoS vulnerability for the .end() method
  • 7bd2272 4.0.0
  • c00fe4f Require Node.js 12 and move to ESM
  • 19bf3f6 Move to GitHub Actions (#3)
  • 1050684 Tidelift tasks
  • b360b8e Improve the regex (#2)
  • bd33090 3.0.0
  • Additional commits viewable in compare view

Updates `chrome-webstore-upload-cli` from 1.1.1 to 2.2.0
Release notes

Sourced from chrome-webstore-upload-cli's releases.

v2.2.0

  • Throw error if manifest.json isn't found (#66) 5426453
  • Fix --help 3e41b10
  • Update dependencies (#65) 6a3b036

https://github.com/fregante/chrome-webstore-upload-cli/compare/v2.1.0...v2.2.0

v2.1.0

  • Always print the full error (#60) 12f9b63

https://github.com/fregante/chrome-webstore-upload-cli/compare/v2.0.1...v2.1.0

v2.0.1

  • Fix documentation 6cc1a08

https://github.com/fregante/chrome-webstore-upload-cli/compare/v2.0.0...v2.0.1

v2.0.0

Breaking

  • Node 14 is now the minimum version
  • Rename CLI command from webstore to chrome-webstore-upload (#53) 45fd16b

Improvements

  • Improve errors (#55) 3c1990d
  • clientSecret is not required if token is for "Chrome App" (fregante/chrome-webstore-upload#46)

Suggestion:

  • keep using the clientSecret if you're upgrading from v1, unless you have issues
  • sooner or later, follow the new guide so you don't have to use the clientSecret anymore

Cleanup

  • Use async functions (#54) 71f6a26
  • Turn into ES Module + update all dependencies (#51) 1829794
  • Upgrade ava and meow (#49) 55d2d6c

Sponsors

Release sponsored by PixieBrix :tada:

https://github.com/fregante/chrome-webstore-upload-cli/compare/v1.2.2...v2.0.0

v1.2.2

  • Meta updates and enable GitHub Actions (#48) c86232c
  • Upgrade meow dependency to v5.0.0 (#47) 3b176ec

... (truncated)

Commits
  • 6dbd98f 2.2.0
  • 3b589ef Drop old notice from readme
  • 5426453 Throw error if manifest.json isn't found (#66)
  • 6a3b036 Update dependencies (#65)
  • e7d5e1a Make it clearer that clientSecret is now required (#62)
  • 3e41b10 Fix --help
  • b10189a 2.1.0
  • 12f9b63 Always print the full error (#60)
  • a13cb1d Fix setup guide link (#57)
  • 2ef02a4 2.0.1
  • Additional commits viewable in compare view
Maintainer changes

This version was pushed to npm by fregante, a new releaser for chrome-webstore-upload-cli since your current version.


Dependabot will resolve any conflicts with this PR as long as you don't alter it yourself. You can also trigger a rebase manually by commenting `@dependabot rebase`. [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-start) [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-end) ---
Dependabot commands and options
You can trigger Dependabot actions by commenting on this PR: - `@dependabot rebase` will rebase this PR - `@dependabot recreate` will recreate this PR, overwriting any edits that have been made to it - `@dependabot merge` will merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot squash and merge` will squash and merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot cancel merge` will cancel a previously requested merge and block automerging - `@dependabot reopen` will reopen this PR if it is closed - `@dependabot close` will close this PR and stop Dependabot recreating it. You can achieve the same result by closing it manually - `@dependabot ignore this major version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this major version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this minor version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this minor version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this dependency` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this dependency (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot use these labels` will set the current labels as the default for future PRs for this repo and language - `@dependabot use these reviewers` will set the current reviewers as the default for future PRs for this repo and language - `@dependabot use these assignees` will set the current assignees as the default for future PRs for this repo and language - `@dependabot use this milestone` will set the current milestone as the default for future PRs for this repo and language You can disable automated security fix PRs for this repo from the [Security Alerts page](https://github.com/harunhasdal/vsts-pr-monitor-chrome/network/alerts).
